headlines.description: Mason Greenwood continued his good form as he struck a late equaliser for Manchester United in the 1-1 draw with Everton at Old Trafford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Greenwood helps Man United draw vs. Everton

headlines.description: Jan Vertonghen scored in stoppage time to secure Spurs an important 2-1 victory over Wolves at Molineux on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vertonghen scores late winner to send Spurs fifth

headlines.description: Kevin De Bruyne ran the show as Manchester City bounced back from their derby defeat against Manchester United by beating Arsenal 3-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City thump Arsenal in De Bruyne masterclass
